# error

**Instance Property**

An error that caused a failure.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated var error: (any Error)? { get }
```

## Discussion

By default, this value is `nil`. If a player reaches a [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer/Status-swift.enum/failed], the system populates this value with an error that describes the failure.

## Determining player readiness

- **status**: A value that indicates the readiness of a player object for playback.
- **AVPlayer.Status**: Status values that indicate whether a player can successfully play media.
